title: A large-scale assessment of eastern whip-poor-will (Antrostomus vociferus) occupancy across a gradient of forest management intensity using autonomous recording units
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 366

Author(s): Jeffery T. Larkin, Darin J. McNeil, Lauren Chronister, Michael E. Akresh, Emily B. Cohen, Anthony W. D'Amato, Cameron J. Fiss, Justin Kitzes, Jeffery L. Larkin, Halie A. Parker, David I. King
